value: Aap pehle iss video ko dekhein continue command ka loop mei kaam samajhne ke liye. Iss understanding ko use kar kar, humein aage likhe hue code ka dry run karna hai.

counter = 0
string = "navgurukul"
while (counter < len(string)):
counter += 1

if string[counter] == "a":
continue

if string[counter] == "u":
continue

print(string[counter])

print("The end", string[counter])
Agar aap yeh diagram dekhoge toh aap samjhoge, ki command se hum loop mei
jo bhi continue ke baad code hai uss loop mei, woh execute nahi hota
loop ki starting mei control flow pahuch jaata hai
Ab iss idea ko use karte hue in example codes ka dry run karein.
Ek baar dhyaan se dekhein ki break aur continue mei kya difference hai

x = 0
while(x<7):
if (x == 3 or x==5):
x = x + 1
continue
print(x)
x = x + 1

x = 10
while(x<20):
if (x == 15):
break
if (x % 2 == 0):
x = x + 1
continue
print x
x = x + 1

num = 2
while(num < 10):
if num % 2 == 0:
print "Found an even number", num
num = num + 1
continue
print "Found a number", num
num = num + 1
Iss program ko execute karo. Iss program ko bina continue statement ke dobara likho.
